desc:
High-definition training videos.
Contact Tom and Dan, the coaches, directly. Success Techniques: Technical, Tactic, and Psychological. Breakdown of technical shots in slow motion.

layout.text: High-quality serving is important at all levels of the game and may make a big difference in tight matches especially when playing opponents with similar skill levels. One of the most frequently used serves in table tennis is the spinning serve, which, if mastered, may net you a lot of cheap points. We'll demonstrate how to accomplish it and provide tips on how to make your own spins serves better.

No matter where you are in your table tennis adventure, understanding how to get better is just a few clicks away. Joining the Academy will give you the focus you need to confidently pursue your objectives and quickly advance in table tennis.
